ISSUE.TITLE: CI broken: apiv2 expecting hardcoded alpine version
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ``` [+0031s] ok 191 [10-images] POST libpod/build?remote=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Falpinelinux%2Fdocker-alpine.git : status=200 not ok 192 [10-images] POST libpod/build?remote=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Falpinelinux%2Fdocker-alpine.git : .stream # expected: ~ STEP 1/5: FROM alpine:3.14 # actual: STEP 1/5: FROM alpine:3.16 ``` [log](https://api.cirrus-ci.com/v1/artifact/task/6343541579317248/html/apiv2-podman-fedora-36-root-host.log.html#t--00191) root cause https://github.com/containers/podman/blob/31bb53f5ffccfa98e991901417b06fc6ab7b19d9/./test/apiv2/10-images.at#L206

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #15365 from edsantiago/test_kube_generate podman kube generate - add actual tests

COMMIT.MESSAGE: fix CI: remove hardcodeded alpine version The apiv2 test hardcoded the tag of the alpine image. Remove it to unblock CI. Fixes: #15388 Signed-off-by: Valentin Rothberg <vrothberg@redhat.com>
fix CI: remove hardcodeded alpine version The apiv2 test hardcoded the tag of the alpine image. Remove it to unblock CI. Fixes: #15388 Signed-off-by: Valentin Rothberg <vrothberg@redhat.com>
